sn29.6:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.6:4.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacce opapātikā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti?
sn29.6:5.1: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekaccānaṃ opapātikānaṃ nāgānaṃ evaṃ hoti:
sn29.6:5.2: ‘mayaṃ kho pubbe kāyena dvayakārino ahumha, vācāya dvayakārino, manasā dvayakārino.
sn29.6:5.3: Te mayaṃ kāyena dvayakārino, vācāya dvayakārino, manasā dvayakārino, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā opapātikānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapannā.
sn29.6:5.4: Sacajja mayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ careyyāma, vācāya …
sn29.6:5.5: manasā sucaritaṃ careyyāma, evaṃ mayaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāma.
sn29.6:5.6: Handa mayaṃ etarahi kāyena sucaritaṃ carāma, vācāya …
sn29.6:5.8: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacce opapātikā nāgā uposathaṃ upavasanti vossaṭṭhakāyā ca bhavantī”ti.
